alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:43PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Salt Lake and southeastern Davis Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 642 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Murray, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, North Salt Lake, Millcreek, Kearns, Salt Lake City International Airport, Granite, Oquirrh, Cottonwood West and Emigration Canyon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 293 and 314. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 112 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
